events.title: Interactive Session with Gaming events (27.02.2021)
events.content: This session is an interactive session planned to interact with the first year volunteers. The first year volunteers were made to involve by participating in gaming events. There were gaming events like connexions, riddles, puzzles. The volunteers participated with enthusiasm. The session was conducted online.

events.title: Motivational Session (02.02.2021)
events.content: A Motivational session was arranged by our NSS volunteers for the first year volunteers. The session was presented by Rotarian G.Gunavathy who started the session with a positive vibe. The session was an interactive one. By the end of the session, she filled the minds of our volunteers with positivity and emphasized our students to work hard to achieve our goal.

events.title: Paper Bag & Slogan Writing (16.10.2019)
events.content: The first year NSS volunteers attended the paper bag session. Volunteers were taught to make recyclable paper bags using newspapers. It involved volunteers of three units. The remaining four units involved in slogan writings about the current issues prevailing in the society. It brought out the ideas and views of the students, which had also created awareness.

events.title: Debate session (23.10.2019)
events.content: There was a debate session for the volunteers which brought up and expressed the ideas of the individuals. The session was interactive by their active participation.

events.title: Communication session (01.10.2019)
events.content: There was an interactive session for the NSS volunteers on October 01, 2019. It included group discussions, debate and other interactive sessions. These sessions ended up with inspiring talents being brought to light.

events.title: Communication session (06.09.2017)
events.content: Communication session, a kind of interactive session on which first year volunteers were asked to communicate and share their ideas on social relative topics to ensure that they were out of stage fear and able to communicate with people. This session was being conducted by senior volunteers.

events.title: Communication session (23.08.2017)
events.content: The NSS volunteers were assembled and divided into groups and sent to respective classrooms. In classrooms, each of the volunteers were made to give self -introduction. They were given information regarding their curriculum and cultural events. They were made to share their new experience in college.

events.title: Communication session (24.09.2016)
events.content: An interactive session was conducted by senior volunteers to discuss their views and suggestions on socially facing issues so that students can provide informative awareness with their surroundings.

events.title: Communication session (24.08.2016)
events.content: Communication session, a kind of interactive session on which first year volunteers were asked to communicate and share their ideas on social relative topics to ensure that they were out of stage fear and able to communicate with people. This session was being conducted by senior volunteers.
